Recommendations: a system of formulating revising and disseminating the program goals and objectives may be adopted and made functional at the college level
consistency and congruence of the program goals and objectives with the vision and mission may be made more evident
the knowledge skills and attitude expected from graduates of the institution may likewise be cascaded course objectives as specific measurable attainable results oriented and timespecific smart
wider participation of concerned groups stakeholders and evidences of dissemination and acceptance may be further enhanced
other modes of determining and quantifying the levels of awareness and acceptability of the vmgo may be explored
